data.title: Biography of Dr. Dre
data.meta_description: First made it big hip-hop group N.W.A. in the 1980s. Dre formed a group with rappers (Eazy-E, Ice Cube, Yella, MC Ren, the Arabian Prince and the D.O.C.) to created N.W.A. (Niggaz With Attitude) in…
data.text:
Andre Romelle Young(Dr Dre)

Is an American rapper, producer and Bussiness Man.

He was Born In Compton (California), on february 18,1964 .

Dr. Dre came from a musical background. Both of his parents were singers.

First made it big hip-hop group N.W.A. in the 1980s. Dre formed a group with rappers (Eazy-E, Ice Cube, Yella, MC Ren, the Arabian Prince and the D.O.C.) to created N.W.A. (Niggaz With Attitude) in 1985.

Dre hit the top of the hip-hop charts with The Chronic on Death Row Records in 1992. Dre helped introduce hip hop and g-funk, which incorporated musical samples and melodies from gangsta rap.

With Marion “Suge” Knight, Dre co-founded the rap empire known as Death Row Records in 1991. he worked on the 1993 debut album of Snoop Dogg, Doggystyle, and Tupac Shakur’s 1996 work All Eyez on Me. the same year Dre left Death Row Records, escaping from the increasingly troublesome West Coast/East Coast rap showdown.

Dre established his own discography , Aftermath Entertainment, in connection with Interscope Records. He produced several of Eminem’s hit including The Slim Shady LP (1999) and The Marshall Mathers LP (2000). With 50 Cent, Dre worked on his debut Get Rich or Die Tryin’(2003), and other projects.

In 2008, Dre expanded his brand of hip hop when Jimmy Iovine founded Beats Electronics with the record producer, He started the company audio line with Beats by the Dr. Dre Studio headphones,they became very popular, and followed most successful products backed by hip hop and pop artists.
